Gatekeeper Minerva:
Hardin's Academy is not to be trifled with. I hope you know what kind of people Necromancers are? They see human flesh and blood as an ingredient for their goals. Their apathy toward death is truly disturbing.
Are you scared? I understand you want to leave right now. But I can't open the Gates of Time and Space.
They found a new way to teleport at the Ivory Tower, but they are still trying to stabilize it, so I can only open the Gates of Time and Space in limited places. If you want to leave this place right now, try using a Scroll of Escape. You should be able to go to the Town of Giran.
